mapper.select: select r.id, r.name, r.speed_limit, a1.id as start_address_id, a2.id as end_address_id from roads r inner join addresses a1 on r.start_address_id = a1.id inner join addresses a2 on r.end_address_id = a2.id where r.id = #{id}

select r.id, r.name, r.speed_limit, a1.id as start_address_id, a2.id as end_address_id from roads r inner join addresses a1 on r.start_address_id = a1.id inner join addresses a2 on r.end_address_id = a2.id where a1.frequency is null

select r.id, r.name, r.speed_limit, a1.id as start_address_id, a2.id as end_address_id from roads r inner join addresses a1 on r.start_address_id = a1.id inner join addresses a2 on r.end_address_id = a2.id where a1.frequency is not null
mapper.insert: insert into roads (name, start_address_id, end_address_id, speed_limit) values (#{name}, #{startAddress.id}, #{endAddress.id}, #{speedLimit})
